name: Legend of Peks
description:
The Legend of Peks was made using RPG Maker MZ's default RTP in less than 100 hours for a subathon challenge for the streamer IHasPeks. for the community
While the game does use the default RTP. as commonly overused as it is, i hope you will find fun in this game
You are free to download and play this game for free.
Heading into the game please be aware of many inside references and possible issues

The Legend of Peks

Adventure

Set forth in a world full of characters with whitty dialogue, crazy events and more. with a lot of inside references

Combat

Do battle with foes in the Active Time Battle system that adds a strategic layer to every battle you face. Fight everything from a snake, crab, pixie's and even a monkey.

Fun

Hopefully... but this was made with a lot of love and passion and i enjoyed every second of it
